name: github-api-usage-monitor
description: Monitor GitHub API usage of a GitHub Action over the course of a job, with bucket-level reporting

scripts.build: ncc build src/main.ts -o dist --license licenses.txt && mv dist/index.js dist/main.js
scripts.build:pre: ncc build src/pre.ts -o dist/pre-tmp && mv dist/pre-tmp/index.js dist/pre.js && rm -rf dist/pre-tmp
scripts.build:post: ncc build src/post.ts -o dist/post-tmp && mv dist/post-tmp/index.js dist/post.js && rm -rf dist/post-tmp
scripts.build:all: npm run clean && npm run build && npm run build:pre && npm run build:post && npm run build:poller
scripts.test:integration: npm run build:poller && vitest run --config vitest.integration.config.ts
scripts.test:all: npm run test:nvm-matches && npm run test && npm run test:integration

author: Really Him
